```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
```

# 1. Loading Data

```{r}
gaz_raw <- read_delim("./CA_Features_20170401.zip", delim="|", col_types = cols())

```

# 2. Create gaz tibble

```{r}
gaz <- gaz_raw %>% 
  select(FEATURE_ID = 1,
         starts_with("FEATURE"),
         STATE_ALPHA,
         COUNTY_NAME,
         ends_with("DEC"),
         ELEV_IN_M,
         MAP_NAME,
         starts_with("DATE")) %>% 
  magrittr::set_colnames(value = tolower(colnames(.)))
```
